task.title: Adding the master host to a resource pool (multi-host deployments)

taskbody.context: Use this procedure to add the master host to a resource pool. For multi-host deployments, the master host is added to its own, separate pool.

step.cmd: Log in to the master host .
Create a new resource pool named master.
Assign administrative and distributed file system (DFS) permissions to the new resource pool.
Add the master host to the new resource pool.
step.stepxmp:
Replace Hostname-Or-IP with the hostname or IP address of the master host: serviced host add --register Hostname-Or-IP:4979 master
If you use a hostname, all of the hosts in your cluster must be able to resolve the name, either through an entry in /etc/hosts or through a nameserver on the network.
